titleStmt.title: The humble congratulation of the nobility and gentry of the county of Lincolne, presented by them to the Kings most excellent Majesty, on Monday the 25th of June, 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Abel Roper, at the Sun over against St. Dunstans church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Sun over against St. Dunstans church in Fleetstreet
